title: Event icon emote doesn't function on Twisted Treeline
body: My friends invited me to play some TT and in game I found out that the emote doesn't work, it's just the regular mastery emote or it says "You haven't unlocked the mastery emote"

replies.body:
Hey Hero of Ideals -

Super sorry about this! D: I'm going to follow up with the pod who works on emotes and see what happened here!
